net.jxta.endpoint.router
Interface EndpointRoutingTransport

All Superinterfaces:
MessageReceiver, MessageSender, MessageTransport
All Known Implementing Classes:
EndpointRouter
public interface EndpointRoutingTransport
extends MessageSender, MessageReceiver

Objects implementing this interface fulfill the endpoint routing protocol duties as specified in the JXTA protocols.

          Provides the route controller attached to this endpoint routing object.
